title: Deadpool & Wolverine
overview: Marvel Studios presents their most significant mistake yet. His days as Deadpool behind him, a listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life. But when his homeworld is threatened, he reluctantly suits up as he tries to convince Wolverine… oh hell, just watch. Warning: Some flashing-lights scenes in this film may affect photosensitive viewers.

title: Moana
overview: Moana sets sail on a daring mission to save her people. Along the way, she meets the once mighty demigod Maui–together they cross the ocean on a fun-filled, action-packed voyage.

title: The Santa Clause
overview: On Christmas Eve, divorced dad Scott Calvin and his son discover Santa Claus has fallen off their roof. When Scott takes the reins of the magical sleigh, he finds he is now the new Santa, and must convince a world of disbelievers, including himself.

title: Madagascar
overview: Having spent their entire lives in blissful captivity, four pampered animals from New York's Central Park zoo are in for a shock when they are unexpectedly shipped to Africa and are shipwrecked on the exotic island of Madagascar!

title: The Santa Clause 2
overview: Tim Allen returns in this heartwarming holiday sequel as Scott Calvin, who has been a very successful and happy Santa for eight years. But now he faces a new challenge: If he doesn't get married by Christmas Eve, he'll stop being Santa forever.

title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
overview: In this sequel to Madagascar, all of the loveable characters are back. This time around, they find themselves in the wildest place of all – the vast plains of Africa – where our zoo-raised crew encounter species of their own kind for the first time.

title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
overview: Tim Allen reprises his role of Scott Calvin-aka Santa as he juggles a full house of family and the mischievous Jack Frost (Martin Short), whose chilling Santa envy has him trying to take over the "big guy's" holiday.
originalTitle: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause

title: Descendants: The Rise of Red
overview: Daughters of the Queen of Hearts and Cinderella travel back in time to prevent a coup in Auradon.

title: Agatha All Along
overview: Agatha Harkness gathers a coven of witches and sets off down, down, down The Witches’ Road.
